This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: there were five bright objects in the sky over the fields.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and i were out driving on Christmas night when i noticed bright lights. i told my wife to stop and pull over. this was on prospect road off of rt 30 exit in mountville. there were cars passing and i was tryin to stop them but they were ignoring me and driving off fast when they saw them. i didn't hear any noise. two lights flew fast across the sky. i got scared and left after about five minutes. i posted my encounter on facebook and someone else responded with there encounter at the same time.
